verbs.description: A deal [V: must] be reached for federal government funding by August break , or lawmakers can not go home , U.S President Donald Trump said on Saturday .
A deal must [V: be] reached for federal government funding by August break , or lawmakers can not go home , U.S President Donald Trump said on Saturday .
[ARG1: A deal] [ARGM-MOD: must] be [V: reached] [C-ARG1: for federal government funding] [ARGM-TMP: by August break] , or lawmakers can not go home , U.S President Donald Trump said on Saturday .
A deal must be reached for federal government funding by August break , or lawmakers [V: can] not go home , U.S President Donald Trump said on Saturday .
A deal must be reached for federal government funding by August break , or [ARG0: lawmakers] [ARGM-MOD: can] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: go] [ARG4: home] , U.S President Donald Trump said on Saturday .
